lines.text: Traveling expenses, eh? Must be traveling by cab.
I got a lighter but it's outta fluid.
I think your head is outta fluid.
I take orders from no one.

[goes to the phone]
Oh yeah? Well maybe you'll take orders from the D.A.
No, wait, I'm just a poor old woman trying to make a living.
Well that makes us even lady, I'm just a poor old man trying to make a living.
Never mind that Louie, he's a beast, the beast of the Bowery.

[slips a $100 into Mrs. Parelli's apron pocket snd takes it out]
You don't have anymore money, eh? Then what's this, old sausage?

[at seance]
H... he... hello, Uncle Jake. You look better now than when you were alive. How is business down there... I mean up there?
